mapper.select: SELECT t1.id,t1.node_code AS nodeCode,t1.use_water_unit_id AS useWaterUnitId,t1.unit_name AS unitName,t1.unit_code AS unitCode, t1.water_meter_code AS waterMeterCode,t1.plan_year AS planYear, t1.cur_year_plan AS curYearPlan,t1.first_quarter AS firstQuarter,t1.second_quarter AS secondQuarter, t1.third_quarter AS thirdQuarter,t1.fourth_quarter AS fourthQuarter, t1.plan_type AS planType, (SELECT dict_item_name FROM t_dict_item WHERE dict_id =(SELECT id FROM t_dict WHERE dict_code = 'changeType') AND dict_item_code = t1.plan_type ) AS planTypeName, t1.create_time AS updateTime,t1.printed AS printed,t1.status AS status, t1.remarks AS remarks FROM t_w_use_water_plan_add t1 WHERE t1.node_code =#{nodeCode} AND t1.unit_code =#{unitCode} AND t1.plan_year =#{planYear} ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC
